title: The excellency of theology compar'd with natural philosophy (as both are objects of men's study) / discours'd of in a letter to a friend by T.H.R.B.E. ... ; to which are annex'd some occasional thouhts about the excellency and grounds of the mechanical hypothesis / by the same author.
author: Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.
publisher: Printed by T.N. for Henry Herringman ...,
